esg.utils.xml
Class Serializer

java.lang.Object
  esg.utils.xml.Serializer

public class Serializer
extends Object

Utility class for writing XML to output. It contains only static methods.

Method to write a DOM document to file. NOTE: the XML will be re-formatted for pretty printing.

root - the root element of the DOM document
outputFile - the intended XML output file
